POSITION  Database Administrator  
REPORTS TO  Manager, Technical Services  
DEPARTMENT  Technical Services  
JOB STATUS  Full-Time  
COMPANY  Rogers Communications Inc.  
DIVISION  Rogers Shared Services  
LOCATION  Ontario  
LOCATION DETAILS  Markham  
JOB TYPE  Information Technology  
JOB REFERENCE #  RILP050  

Responsibilities


Perform application and database optimization by working with developers, customers and system support personnel.
Investigate and provide methodology, processes and procedures to exploit new features and directions of IMS.
Provide optimization recommendations through historical analysis.
Physical design of application database and file structures.
Increase database reliability and availability through process improvement.
Evaluate, provide and maintain software tools to assist internal and external customers.
Aid in problem determination and resolution.
Provide database and related system support.
Provide on-call assistance for database related problems.


Qualifications


University degree in computer science or equivalent with substantial directly related work experience.
Minimum 5 years Database Administrator experience
Excellent working knowledge of Oracle, Unix, and Scripting
Excellent ability of RDBM database problem determination and resolution
Knowledge of AIX, HP and SUN, NT, Progress and SYBASE would be an asset
Strong organizational, interpersonal, motivational & Analytical skills
Effective written & verbal Communication skills
Availability for on-call support of database related activities
Ability to work effectively on multiple simultaneous tasks within fast paced, “high tech” customer service oriented environments
Ability to complete project tasks in a timely manner
Outstanding customer service skills

Apply for this opportunity using the on-line resume.
Learn of other ways to apply for this opportunity.

Interested Applicants please forward resumes to rsscareers@rci.rogers.com quoting job code number RILP050 in subject line
